fields.label: Species

fields.label: Gender

fields.label: Colour

fields.label: Breed

fields.name: age
fields.label: Age

fields.name: reasonforparting
fields.label: Owner`s reason for parting with animal

fields.name: haslivedchildren
fields.label: Has the animal lived with children?

fields.name: childrendetails
fields.label: If yes, please specify the ages of children and animal`s behaviour

fields.name: childrencontact
fields.label: If no, has the animal had frequent contact with children?

fields.name: childrendetails2
fields.label: If yes, please specify the ages of children and animal`s behaviour

fields.name: livedother
fields.label: Has the animal lived with animals other than cats and dogs? If so, please specify

fields.name: usedmenwomen
fields.label: Is the animal used to men and women?

fields.name: neutered
fields.label: Has the animal been neutered?

fields.name: wherefrom
fields.label: Where did you get the animal from initially?

fields.name: behaviour
fields.label: How would you describe your animal`s behaviour? For example: bold, shy, timid, aggressive, affectionate

fields.name: grooming
fields.label: How does your animal react to grooming?

fields.name: vets
fields.label: How does your animal behave at the vets?

fields.name: medical
fields.label: Does your animal have any medical conditions that are undergoing treatment?

fields.name: operations
fields.label: Has your animal had any previous operations or treatment for medical conditions?

fields.name: allergies
fields.label: Does your animal have any known allergies?

fields.name: biting
fields.label: Is he/she prone to biting?

fields.name: unusual
fields.label: Has he/she any unusual behavioural habits?

fields.name: vacc
fields.label: Have you got vaccination records for the animal?

fields.name: destructive
fields.label: Has the animal ever been destructive in the house? Please describe

fields.name: hasliveddogs
fields.label: Has the animal lived with dogs? If so, please specify age, sex and reaction

fields.name: haslivedcats
fields.label: Has the animal lived with cats? If so, please specify age, sex and reaction

fields.name: feeding
fields.label: Please describe your animal`s feeding regime - brands of food, scraps, dry or tinned, flavours, feeding times and quantities. Any dislikes?

fields.name: housetrained
fields.label: Is the dog housetrained?

fields.name: travel
fields.label: Does the animal travel well?

fields.name: leavealone
fields.label: Do you leave the animal alone for any period of time? If so, how long for and do you have concerns about them being on their own?

fields.name: collarharness
fields.label: Is the dog walked on a collar or a harness?

fields.name: reactwalk
fields.label: How does the dog react to other dogs outside of the home, e.g. on walks?

fields.name: giveuptoys
fields.label: Will the animal give up toys when commanded to?

fields.name: persontype
fields.label: Person providing information
